price: Hivi ndivyo itakavyo kuwa, na tutawaoza mahurilaini.
footnotes: Na pamoja na malipo haya tutawaoza huko Peponi mahurulaini, ambao huwezi kuwachanganyia jicho kwa hadi ya uzuri wao na ukubwa wa macho yao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
